name: SquareTown
description:
Welcome to Square Town. 

This is my entry for Small World Jam. It's a very tiny city builder. 

I think everything should be clear from the get-go, but I will still go over the main elements of the game:

  • when the game starts, you'll have 4 villagers
  • build structures to produce wood, iron, food from the natural resources spread across the map
  • buy/sell resources as you see fit
  • your people will slowly consume the food stored
  • if you run out of food, they will start dying because of the famine
  • if they all die, that will mark the end of Square Town

The goal of the game is to build the Tower.T o do so, you will need resources aplenty, a sizable population and your village needs to have survived for some time. This will put to test your management skills.

To control the camera, hold down the right mouse button and move the cursor.

I'm sure the game is super unpolished and there are probably some bugs I didn't get to fix, but it should be playable. I hope you'll spend some fun and comfy times here in Square Town.

Note: This game features waving. Villagers will wave at each other every now and then edit: v1.1 fixes a bug with the fields preventing the player to build something else over them edit: v1.2 
  • fixed a bug where a map tile became unusable after destroying a building
  • fixed a bug where villagers would get stuck in their harvesting animation if the resource they were looking for gets destroyed while they're going to it
  • a few minor fixes and tweaks
Thank you so much for the incredible support. I never expected for this tiny little game to have so much following and love. Thank you all for playing it, even in its bug-ridden state.
